snippet: Dalton Prout and Artem Anisimov scored second-period goals, and the visiting Columbus Blue Jackets held off the Maple Leafs. Toronto dropped its third straight since the Winter Olympics.
abstract: Columbus Blue Jackets defeat Toronto Maple Leafs, 2-1; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dalton Prout and Artem Anisimov scored second-period goals, and the visiting Columbus Blue Jackets held off the Maple Leafs. Toronto dropped its third straight since the Winter Olympics.
